name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven AI Full-stack Engineer with 9+ years of experience in developing robust applications, specializing in cloud deployment strategies and web services. Proficient in **React.js**, **Node.js**, **Python**, and frameworks such as **FastAPI**, **Flask**, and **Django**. Expertise in building RESTful APIs and integrating machine learning capabilities into applications. Experienced in cloud services including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, along with containerization technologies like **Docker**. Strong background in agile methodologies and effective communication, with a proven track record of leading projects to successful completion and optimizing performance.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed scalable web applications utilizing **React.js** and **Node.js**, contributing to an increase in user engagement by **20%**.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to ensure seamless integration with machine learning models, leveraging technologies such as **FastAPI** and **Flask**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an **Agile** environment to deliver high-quality software solutions within tight deadlines.
Employed cloud deployment strategies on **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, ensuring high availability and optimized performance of applications.
Integrated containerization techniques using **Docker**, resulting in streamlined development and deployment processes.
Utilized advanced AI and machine learning techniques to enhance application capabilities, improving data processing efficiency by **30%**.
Ensured secure application architecture through effective implementation of authentication and authorization protocols like JWT.
Facilitated effective communication across teams to align on project objectives and deliverables, leading to a remarkable **15%** increase in project success rates.

Developed and maintained RESTful APIs using **Node.js** and **FastAPI** to support AI-driven applications, ensuring seamless integration with various web services.
Designed and implemented cloud deployment strategies on **AWS** and **Azure**, facilitating a scalable infrastructure for AI solutions that improved deployment times by **20%**.
Utilized **React.js** for building interactive user interfaces, contributing to a **15%** increase in user adoption rates for AI applications.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and managed agile methodologies, ensuring timely completion of deliverables.
Implemented web services with **Flask** and **Django**, improving data processing speed and enhancing user experience for machine learning models.
Created high-performance containerized applications using **Docker**, streamlining development and reducing deployment errors by **25%**.
Leveraged machine learning frameworks for data analysis and AI model training, enabling predictive insights for end-users.
Conducted code reviews and provided mentorship to junior developers, fostering skill growth and enhancing team productivity by **30%**.
Engaged in effective communication with stakeholders to align project goals and manage expectations throughout the development lifecycle.

Utilized **React.js** to develop engaging user interfaces, enhancing the customer experience by 30%.
Implemented **Node.js** and **Express** for backend development of scalable RESTful APIs that increased response times by 25%.
Designed and deployed AI-driven solutions using **Python** and **Flask**, resulting in improved data processing speeds by 40%.
Leveraged **FastAPI** to build high-performance web services, achieving over 99% uptime across applications.
Integrated cloud deployment strategies using **AWS** and **Azure**, leading to a 50% reduction in deployment times and improving scalability.
Collaborated in an **agile** development environment, participating in daily standups and sprint reviews to ensure project alignment and timely delivery.
Implemented **Docker** for containerization of applications, simplifying the deployment process and efficiency.
Developed machine learning models that enhanced predictive analytics capabilities, increasing accuracy by 35%.
Provided technical documentation and user guides for all systems created, significantly improving knowledge transfer and support efficiency.
Supported the integration of AI-driven features into existing platforms, facilitating seamless user interaction with the systems.
